task.shortdesc: This tutorial will help you to change the privacy settings for your personal information. As a part of thee Family Education Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA) you have the right to restrict part or all of your director information
task.prereq: You must Log in to the MyPack portal using your NC State Unity Credentials. Dual authentication may be required.

step.cmd: From the left-hand navigation menu, select "Privacy Restrictions"

substep.cmd: Select restrict under the directory field you would like to restrict access to.
Select clear if you wish to release the restriction for that field.

step.cmd: If you want to create a full privacy block, Select that field and check restricted.
step.info: Select a “full privacy” block to prevent us from sharing your information with anyone, including employers. A full privacy block also prevents your inclusion in graduation and Dean’s List publications.

substeps.substep: Select any exceptions you would like to grant.

step.cmd: Click the green "Save" button to save your changes.
